context: I failed to appreciate your sacrifices
letters:
Dear Mom,

I hope this note finds you well. I’ve been reflecting on my actions and the words I’ve spoken lately, and I feel compelled to reach out and express my sincerest apologies.

I realize that I have failed to fully appreciate the countless sacrifices you have made for me over the years. Your unwavering support and selflessness have shaped my life in ways I often take for granted. I understand now that these sacrifices came from a place of love, and I am truly sorry for not acknowledging them as I should have.

I regret any hurt my lack of appreciation may have caused you. You have always put my needs before your own, and I didn’t recognize the depth of your commitment until now. Thank you for being my greatest advocate and for the countless ways you’ve nurtured and guided me. I want you to know that I am listening and learning, and I promise to be more aware of the love and effort you pour into our family.

Please forgive me for my insensitivity. I am deeply grateful to have you as my mother, and I hope to show you that gratitude more consistently moving forward. 

With all my love,

[Your Name]
